General.Name: Fuzhou Rockchip Electronics Co Ltd
General.Description: Rockchip Electronics Co., Ltd. operates as a fabless IC design company in China. It offers intelligent application processor chips, including general-purpose processors, machine vision processors, vehicle-mounted processors, and industrial control processors; system-on-chip solutions, including artificial intelligence Internet of Things general computing platform RK3562, streaming media processor RK3528, and machine vision processor RV1106/RV1103; and high-performance intelligent application processor chips and application solutions, as well as various peripheral chips and component products. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Fuzhou, China.
General.Address: No. 18 Building, A District, Fuzhou, China, 350003
